mapper.insert: insert into t_cards ( name , info , image , createTime , status , isDel , delTime , beginTime , endTime, completeNum ) VALUES ( #{name} , #{info} , #{image} , #{createTime} , #{status} , #{isDel} , #{delTime} , #{beginTime} , #{endTime}, #{completeNum} )
mapper.update:
update t_cards set name = #{name} , info = #{info} ,
image = #{image} ,
status = #{status} ,
isDel = #{isDel} ,
delTime = #{delTime} ,
completeNum = #{completeNum} ,
beginTime = #{beginTime} , endTime = #{endTime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from (select count(1) from t_cards a left join t_card c on c.cardsId = a.id left join t_user_card u on u.cardId = c.id
group by a.id) c
